TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StringFreezingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class StringFreezingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class StringFreezingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 在使用 Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator) 创建本机映像时冻结字符串。

span.span: Freezes a string literal when creating native images using the Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本 3.5 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和更高版本中已弃用。The class has been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 3.5 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and later versions. 冻结字符串是与托管堆兼容的字符串文字对象, 并已通过[ngen.exe (本机映像生成器)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md)序列化为本机映像。A frozen string is a string literal object that is compatible with the managed heap and has been serialized into a native image by the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md). 特性使你可以通过在本机映像生成期间 (而不是在运行时) 预分配字符串来优化代码。The attribute allows you to optimize your code by pre-allocating string literals during native image generation rather than at run time. 已冻结字符串文本后, 代码可以直接使用本机映像中的地址引用字符串。After a string literal has been frozen, code can simply refer to the string using the address in the native image. 必须应用于程序集级别。The must be applied on the assembly level. 请注意, 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 无法卸载具有冻结字符串的任何本机映像, 因为堆中的任何对象都可能引用冻结字符串。Note that the common language runtime (CLR) cannot unload any native image that has a frozen string because any object in the heap might refer to the frozen string. 因此, 仅当包含冻结字符串的本机映像在很大程度上共享时, 才应使用类。Therefore, you should use the class only in cases where the native image that contains the frozen string is shared heavily. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将应用于程序集。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute/vb/example.vb#1)]
